blocks.text: Example 22. Find the inclination to the horizontal of a cable weighing 1 lb. per ft. and stretched to a tension of 30 lbs. weight, at the end of its span of 50 ft.

blocks.latex:
T = \left( e^{\frac{y}{x}} - e^{-\frac{y}{x}} \right) = 30 \\
\text{where } e^{\frac{y}{x}} = \text{horizontal tension}\, \text{and } y = \text{weight per foot}
